title: Bug 48387Make RemoteIpFilter parameters consistent with RemoteIpValve
description: Bug 48387Make RemoteIpFilter parameters consistent with RemoteIpValve Created attachment 24705 [details]Rename RemoteIpFilterprotocolHeaderSslValue into protocolHeaderHttpsValueRemoteIpFilter field 'protocolHeaderSslValue' is not consistent with RemoteIpValve where it is named 'protocolHeaderHttpsValue'.Proposed patch renames 'protocolHeaderSslValue' into 'protocolHeaderHttpsValue' (field + getter and setter) and enhance one javadoc sentence.
